features.weatherDescription: Thola izibikezelo zezulu eziqondile epulazini lakho

onboarding.locationDescription: Yabelana ngendawo yakho ukuze uthole izibikezelo zezulu eziqondile nezeluleko zokulima zesifunda sakho.
onboarding.locationError: Ayikwazi ukuthola indawo. Sicela uzame futhi.

chat.imageAnalysisFailedBot: Ukuhlaziya isithombe kwehlulekile. Sicela uzame futhi.

media.photoLibraryPermission: Ukufinyelela kugalari yezithombe kuyadingeka ukuze ukhethe izithombe. Vula kuzilungiselelo.
media.cameraPermission: Ukufinyelela kwikhamera kuyadingeka ukuze uthathe izithombe. Vula kuzilungiselelo.
media.pickImageFailed: Kwehlulekile ukukhetha isithombe. Sicela uphinde uzame.
media.cameraFailed: Kwehlulekile ukufinyelela ikhamera. Sicela uphinde uzame.
media.uploadHint: Thatha noma khetha isithombe sokubheka impilo yesitshalo.

voice.voiceUnavailableLater: Izwi alitholakali - sicela uzame futhi emuva kwesikhashana
voice.recordingHint: Thepha Qedile ukubhala izwi phansi, noma Khansela ukulahla

history.title: Izingxoxo
history.noConversationsHint: Qala ingxoxo entsha ukuze uthole izeluleko zokulima

settings.title: Izilungiselelo
settings.aiServicesSubtitle: Buka izinsiza ze-AI ezisebenzayo esifundeni sakho
settings.locationUpdateFailed: Ayikwazanga ukubuyekeza indawo. Sicela uzame futhi.
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Lokhu kuzoqala kabusha inqubo yesiqalo. Uyafuna ukuqhubeka?

mcp.title: Izinsizakalo ze-AI
mcp.servicesAvailable: Izinsizakalo eziyi-{active} kweziyi-{total} zitholakala endaweni yakho

agrivision.name: AgriVision
agrivision.tagline: Ukuthola nokuhlaziya izifo zezitshalo ngobuchwepheshe be-AI
agrivision.description: Hlaziya izithombe zezitshalo ukuthola izifo, izinambuzane, nokushoda kwezakhamzimba. Thola ukuhlaziya okusheshayo nezincomo zokwelapha namathiphu okuvikela.

isdaSoil.name: ISDA Soil
isdaSoil.description: Thola imininingwane eningiliziwe yenhlabathi efaka i-pH, i-nitrogen, i-phosphorus, i-potassium, nezinye izakhamzimba. Ihlanganisa yonke i-Afrika ngokucaca kwamamitha angu-30.

accuweather.name: AccuWeather
accuweather.tagline: Isimo samanje sezulu nezibikezelo zomhlaba wonke
accuweather.description: Finyelela idatha yesimo sezulu ngesikhathi sangempela, kufaka phakathi izinga lokushisa, umswakama, isivinini somoya, nemvula. Izibikezelo zitholakala kuze kube yizinsuku eziyi-15.

gapWeather.name: GAP Weather
gapWeather.description: Izibikezelo zezulu ezikhethekile zezolimo eKenya. Kufaka ukuhwamuka kwamanzi, imisebe yelanga, nezibikezelo zemvula ezilungiselelwe izinqumo zokulima.

edacap.name: EDACaP Climate
edacap.tagline: Izibikezelo zesimo sezulu ngezikhathi zonyaka zase-Ethiopia
edacap.description: Ukubikezelwa kwesimo sezulu ngezikhathi zonyaka kufaka phakathi izinga lokushisa nezibikezelo zemvula. Kusiza abalimi ukuhlela izikhathi zokutshala nokuvuna.

weatherapi.name: WeatherAPI
weatherapi.tagline: Idatha yesimo sezulu ezindaweni zomhlaba wonke
weatherapi.description: Isevisi yedatha yesimo sezulu ephelele enikeza izimo zamanje nezibikezelo zezindawo zomhlaba wonke.

tomorrowIo.name: Tomorrow.io
tomorrowIo.description: Ipulatifomu ethuthukisiwe yobuchwepheshe bezulu enezibikezelo ezinokucaca okuphezulu namakhono okubikezela okusheshayo.

feedFormulation.name: Ukuxuba Okuphakelayo
feedFormulation.tagline: Ukubala kokudla okungcono kakhulu kwezinkomo zobisi
feedFormulation.description: Bala ingxube yokuphakelayo engabizi kakhulu yezinkomo zakho zobisi. Kucatshangelwa izinjongo zokukhiqiza ubisi, isisindo somzimba, nokuphakelayo kwendawo okutholakala.

nextgen.name: Umfunzo Wesizukulwane Esisha
nextgen.description: Thola izincomo zomfunzo ezinembile ngokusekelwe endaweni yakho eqondile. Kufaka phakathi izincomo zomfunzo wemvelo (umquba, umquba wezimpethu) nowokwenziwa (Urea, NPS).

decisionTree.name: Uhlelo Lwesinqumo Sezitshalo
decisionTree.description: Thola izincomo zokuphatha izitshalo ngokusekelwe ezingeni lokukhula nesimo sezulu samanje. Kukusiza ukwenza izinqumo ezifanele zokulawula izinambuzane, ukuchelela, nokuvuna.

gapAgriculture.name: GAP Agriculture
gapAgriculture.description: Izinsizakalo zokweluleka ngezolimo ezijwayelekile zokuphatha izitshalo nezilwane ezifuywayo.

system.restartRequiredMessage: Ukushintshela ku-{language} kudinga ukuqala kabusha uhlelo ukuze kushintshe ukubukeka.
system.pleaseRestartMessage: Sicela uvale bese uvula kabusha uhlelo ukuze izinguquko zibonakale.

errors.weatherUnavailable: Isimo sezulu asitholakali okwamanje. Zama futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
errors.diagnosisTimeout: Ukuxilongwa kwezitshalo kuthatha isikhathi eside kakhulu. Sicela uzame futhi.
errors.uploadFailed: Ukufaka isithombe kuhlulekile. Hlola uxhumano lwakho bese uzama futhi.
errors.transcriptionFailed: Ukubhala phansi kwezwi kuhlulekile. Zama ukukhuluma futhi.
errors.serverError: Iphutha laseva. Sicela uzame futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
errors.requestTimeout: Isicelo siphelele isikhathi. Hlola uxhumano lwakho.
errors.mcpServersFailed: Izinsizakalo ze-AI azikwazanga ukulayishwa. Ezinye izici zingase zingasebenzi.

diagnosis.networkErrorMessage: Asikwazanga ukuhlaziya isithombe. Sicela uhlole uxhumano lwakho lwe-inthanethi bese uzama futhi.
diagnosis.timeoutMessage: Ukuhlaziya kuthatha isikhathi eside. Zama futhi ngesithombe esicacile.
diagnosis.notPlantMessage: Lesi akusona isithombe sesitshalo. Ngicela uthathe isithombe seqabunga lesitshalo, isiqu, noma indawo eboshiwe.
diagnosis.poorQualityMessage: Isithombe sifiphele kakhulu noma simnyama. Asikwazi ukuxilonga kahle.
diagnosis.screenshotMessage: Lokhu kubonakala kuyisithombe esithathwe esikrinini, hhayi isithombe sesitshalo. Ngicela uthathe isithombe esiqondile sesitshalo sakho.
diagnosis.textImageMessage: Lokhu kubonakala kuwumbhalo noma idokhumenti. Ngicela uthathe isithombe sesitshalo sangempela ofuna usizo ngaso.
diagnosis.guardrailMessage: Lesi sithombe asikwazi ukucutshungulwa. Ngicela uthathe isithombe esicacile sesitshalo sakho.
